abstract: Sidestreet column; artist Manny Vega of Manhattan's Upper West Side has undertaken large mosaic tribute to the late Dr Antonia Pantoja, whose contributions to the Puerto Rican community of New York City brought her the Presidential Medal of Freedom in 1996; project's supporters say Pantoja's activism and community service, particularly in East Harlem, have long been overlooked.
lead_paragraph: Manny Vega is creating a mosaic of Antonia Pantoja, whose life of activism and service to help New York City’s growing Puerto Rican community earned her the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

headline.main: A Puerto Rican Luminary Emerges, Piece by Glistening Piece
headline.print_headline: A Puerto Rican Luminary Emerges, Piece by Glistening Piece

snippet: Manny Vega is creating a mosaic of Antonia Pantoja, whose life of activism and service to help New York City’s growing Puerto Rican community earned her the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
